plan_metadata.title: Recipe Library Completion Plan - Systematic Fix of ALL Recipes

executive_summary.problem_statement: The recipe library contains recipes with generic atomic tasks that leave room for interpretation. All recipes must be updated to match the infrastructure recipe level of detail with extremely specific commands, file paths, and acceptance criteria.
executive_summary.solution_approach: Systematically fix ALL recipes in numerical order, starting from 01-infrastructure, ensuring each recipe has the proper v5.0.0 structure with exact specifications.
executive_summary.success_criteria: All 24 recipes must have extremely specific atomic tasks with no room for interpretation, exact commands, file paths, acceptance criteria, and proper v5.0.0 structure.

critical_issues: Generic atomic tasks leave room for interpretation
Missing exact commands and file paths
Some recipes missing proper v5.0.0 elements
